ns2:member.ns1:desc: Initial value or the reason is unknown after program restart.
The association was closed down because the SCTP Host has restarted.
Shutdown Failure, max SHUTDOWN retransmits reached.
The SCTP user has requested graceful shutdown of the association.
An ABORT chunk with unknown reason was received by SCTP, or SCTP internal error.
The remote side has closed the association ungracefully.
Maximum number of retransmissions (defined by associationMaxRtx and pathMaxRtx attributes of Sctp or SctpProfile MO) reached.
An ABORT chunk with the reason "Out Of Resources" was received by SCTP, or there are not enough resources in the local SCTP to proceed.
The remote side has requested graceful shutdown of the association.
An ABORT chunk with the reason "No user data" was received by SCTP.
SCTP is not able to reassemble a message that was fragmented on the remote side.
SCTP has received a DATA chunk with incorrect stream sequence number.
Invalid SACK chunk is received.
The SCTP user has requested to close the association ungracefully or to delete the endpoint for the association.
An ABORT chunk with the reason "Invalid Stream Identifier" was received, or the SCTP has received a DATA chunk with invalid stream identifier.
An ABORT chunk with the reason "Invalid Mandatory Parameter" has been received by SCTP, or a received chunk contains a mandatory parameter with an invalid value.
An ABORT chunk with the reason "restart of an Association with New Addresses" was received, or an INIT chunk was received and its IP addresses were previously not part of the association.
An ABORT chunk with the reason "Protocol Violation" has been received, or the SCTP has detected a protocol violation of the peer.

An ICMP message is received and is treated as an ABORT chunk: - Type is "Destination unreachable", Code is "Protocol unreachable" for IPv4. - Type is "Parameter problem", Code is "Unrecognized Next Header type encountered" for IPv6.
Connection with the SCTP user is lost.
SCTP was unable to send data because the Receiver Window (RWND) on the remote side was closed for a time longer than 4*associationMaxRtx*maximumRto.
